text: Shoichiro Toyoda KBE (豊田 章一郞, Toyoda Shōichirō, February 27, 1925 — February 14, 2023) was a Japanese businessman. Toyoda served as chairman of Toyota Motor Corporation between 1992 to 1999Toyota: Honorary Chairman and also serving as chairman of the powerful ,Basu, Shankar. (1999). Corporate Purpose: Why it Matters More Than Strategy, p. 55. beginning in May 1994 through May 1998. "Imai officially tapped by Toyoda to head Keidanren," Japan Times. January 12, 1998 ;Keidanren: New Year's greeting, 1994. Toyoda died on February 14, 2023, at the age of 97. ==References== ==Other websites== *Toyota Motor Corporation: official bio Category:1925 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Japanese businesspeople Category:Toyota
title: Shoichiro Toyoda
